reviews.review_msg: One of the best! I've had Catheryn twice and what you put into her class is what you get out.  Expect to work hard but make a point to visit her in office hours and you'll be amazed at the help & direction you receive.

I had CAtherine for CMNS 130 and I HATED her.. I learnt nothing. But when I took her again for upper level, I really come to appreciate her. Although the lectures are still boring, but she's passionate about teaching and shows great interest in students' projects.

Very challenging class, but also one of the most instructive and rewarding I've taken as well. Catherine is an advanced lecturer and she's extremely knowledgeable. She can be a bit disorganized and pedantic at times, but her strengths and willingness to help students more than make up for this.
she is a powerhouse of knowledge on her topics. hard to follow her in lecture sometimes, but brilliant when you ask her for help. take her advice! you'll be glad you did!

Very, very heavy work-load! Expects lots of time to be spent working as a group.  Her lectures were kinda irrelevant to the group projects that were worth 60% of the final grade.  Expect to work your butt off if u take this course with her.
She's such a great lecturer! She's knowledeable and helpful! I've never met such a nice prof like her befoer
Greatest ever. But most people just don't get his flow.
If you are into kittens and learning about NOTHING, take this class. Cmns 363 requires A LOT of work and I did not learn a single thing from him. If you like disorganized profs, take this course.
Excellent guy.  He's an awesome person to talk to (really, really interesting character).  NOT a good educator/professor though.  Don't expect to learn a whole lot from his lectures.

Roman is such a cool teacher. He has a way of teaching that is all-inspiring.  He's got a lot of experience and knowledge about all realms of communication making the classes easy to understand and relate to.
